title: Noodles in Creamy Tuna-Tomato-Cheese Sauce
ingredients: 4 tbsp diced tomatoes or 1 can, alternatively fresh diced tomatoes
1 can tuna in its own juice
a lot of fresh or frozen basil
instructions: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions until al dente. Sauté the onions in oil until translucent, add the tomato paste and sauté briefly, then add a bit of sugar. Add the garlic and the diced tomatoes (not pureed, chunky is preferred). Pour in some vegetable broth, cover with a lid, and let the sauce simmer briefly. Add the tuna (with its juice, if desired) and heat in the sauce. Stir in the cream cheese, sour cream, and basil, then season with black pepper and salt if needed. Combine the noodles with the sauce and enjoy. You can vary the amounts of cheese and sour cream as you like.
